headline: It’s Official: Nvidia Becomes the First $5T Company in History
summary: The chip maker ended Wednesday with a market cap of $5.034 trillion, becoming the first company to close above $5 trillion in history.  It reached that level only 78 trading days after it hit $4 trillion in market cap.  According to Dow Jones Market Data, Nvidia is larger than the GDP of every country in 2024 except for the U.S. and China.

content.title: It’s Official: Nvidia Becomes the First $5T Company in History
content.summary: The chip maker ended Wednesday with a market cap of $5.034 trillion, becoming the first company to close above $5 trillion in history.  It reached that level only 78 trading days after it hit $4 trillion in market cap.  According to Dow Jones Market Data, Nvidia is larger than the GDP of every country in 2024 except for the U.S. and China.

headline: No Tech Wreck From a More Hawkish Fed
summary: The broader market dipped into the red due to concerns the Federal Reserve may not lower interest rates again in December after all.  Nvidia, which is now worth more than $5 trillion, remained in green after hitting a new intraday all-time high.  Nvidia chip rivals Advanced Micro Devices and Broadcom, data storage firms Western Digital and Seagate (which reported strong earnings Wednesday morning) and big data darling Palantir Technologies.

content.summary: The broader market dipped into the red due to concerns the Federal Reserve may not lower interest rates again in December after all. Nvidia chip rivals Advanced Micro Devices and Broadcom, data storage firms Western Digital and Seagate (which reported strong earnings Wednesday morning) and big data darling Palantir Technologies.

headline: Nvidia Is Accelerating Its Investing Spree in AI Startups
summary: It’s part of a growing string of bets on private artificial intelligence companies Nvidia has made across the world.  At the company’s highly anticipated GTC event in Washington on Tuesday, Nvidia Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang called out a number of private companies that his company's taken stakes in by name, including the AI firm Perplexity, the Chinese autonomous vehicle company WeRide and the robotics startup Figure AI.

content.title: Nvidia Is Accelerating Its Investing Spree in AI Startups
